Attacks.Name: Vine Whip
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is Pushed away from this character by S distance.

Attacks.Name: Seed Bomb
Attacks.Effect: This attack causes an explosion. After the attack is resolved, other characters within range 1 of the target suffer 1 damage.

Attacks.Name: Sludge Bomb
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is given the Poison special condition.

Superpowers.Name: Overgrow
Superpowers.Effect: When this character has 2 or fewer Stamina remaining, increase the Strength of its 'Vine Whip' attack by 2.

Attacks.Name: Razor Leaf
Attacks.Effect: This attack deals damage to each character within range and line of sight of the target character.

Superpowers.Name: Evolution
Superpowers.Effect: Replace this character with a Ivysaur character of the same injured status. The new character begins with damage equal to the damage on this character and power equal to the power on this character.
